Articles.Content:
Well, I took the plunge and really like the new decouplers and the Mk1-3 command pod for a rebalanced mass, moved hatch and included rcs!  I was disappointed at the lack of 1.85m parts and the lack of texture passes for the 1.25 and 3.75 tanks and that the 2.5 lander can is now heavier than the command pod!

I am personally not fussed on the parachutes.

But given I've got my mod options in 1.3.1 where I want them, I really wanted these updated stock parts.  Turns out the Mk1-3 at least can be dropped into 1.3.1.  And its RCS works too!  I think I've solved the issue.  Move the new parts to my old save and carry on.  Sorted!

Peace.

1 hour ago, theJesuit said:

I was disappointed at the lack of 1.85m parts

Maybe that's because there never have been any 1.85m parts?

The Making history Expansion has 1.85m parts. There may could have been a bit of confusion about it being stock or not

16 minutes ago, JAFO said:

Maybe that's because there never have been any 1.85m parts?

1 minute ago, GrandProtectorDark said:

The Making history Expansion has 1.85m parts. There may could have been a bit of confusion about it being stock or not

 

Ahh.. there's been a good bit of that, I've noticed.. people assuming that MH parts and features are also part of stock 1.4, and getting upset that they can't find them.

4 hours ago, JAFO said:

 

Ahh.. there's been a good bit of that, I've noticed.. people assuming that MH parts and features are also part of stock 1.4, and getting upset that they can't find them.

We'll I didn't expect boiler plates and engines... but the 1.85 seemed like an obvious throw to the community basically.  I just haven't thrown out the Socke ones from many müns ago!

But taking the parts backwards fo 1.3.1 qas worthy of a mention. When i tried the new command pod i didnt think the RCS would work... but it does!

Now there will have to be a balance pass for some of the masses methinks not just for stock but also Near Future Spacecraft...

Peace.
